channel.title: Quick Help ? please
channel.description: Ok our server has iron whips - barrows whips how do we change the speed of each whip? and also how do u change the attack requirements of each whip for example iron whip- 1 attack mithril whip- 20 attack rune whip - 40 attack dragon whip - 60 attack barrows whip 70 attack anyone know???

item.title: Quick Help ? please
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

For requirements:

For an example, let’s assume that you are trying to make this work for a regular whip.
Whip ID = 4151
playerLevel[0] = attack

if(wearID == 4151 && playerLevel[0] < 70){ sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item."); sM("You need to have an attack level of 70."); return false; }

playerLevel[0] = Attack
playerLevel[1] = Defence
playerLevel[2] = Strength
playerLevel[3] = Hitpoints
playerLevel[4] = Range
playerLevel[5] = Prayer
playerLevel[6] = Magic

If you want to do it with items 9800-9811. Replace the WearId number with that.
Depending if it is a weapon, armor it has different requirements. Since I used whip, whip only has requirements for attack. playerLevel[0] is = attack. So I say playerLevel[0] < 70. Because you need a requirement of at least 70 to wear whip.

(Keep in mind, I’m not the best coder.)

As for speed, I’m not 100% sure.

Read full topic
